results.title: Simvastatin radiosensitizes differentiated and stem-like breast cancer cell lines and is associated with improved local control in inflammatory breast cancer patients treated with postmastectomy radiation.
results.text_hl: However, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ radioprotects MICs of non-@<m>DISEASE_Inflammatory_Breast_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058922 @@@IBC@@@ cell lines @CELLLINE_CVCL:0031 @@@MCF-7@@@ and @CELLLINE_CVCL:0033 @@@SKBR3@@@.

Simvastatin radiosensitizes differentiated and stem-like breast cancer cell lines and is associated with improved local control in inflammatory breast cancer patients treated with postmastectomy radiation.
